title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He Stabbed Carmine Persico's Son In A Bar, They Killed him"
description: Sammy tells us about an old flame of his, and how she reached out after years of separation. It turns out that she needs help to save her brothers life, and Sammy is the only man with the power to do it.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells us about an old flame of his, and how she reached out after years of separation. It turns out that she needs help to save her brothers life, and Sammy is the only man with the power to do it.
